name: Rayman 2: The Great Escape
description:
This script will install "Rayman 2" GOG edition for modern computer configuration.
During install please let all options by default.
Big thanks to people who gave their time to permit us playing this game in the best conditions.
notes:
- Widescreen patch added for 16/9 and 16/10 ratio screens.
- x360 gamepad support.
- Known issues: you have to wait about 1 minute before the game starts. During this time, the screen may flash in black and white.
- Please report issue concerning this script on my Github page:
https://github.com/legluondunet/MyLittleLutrisScripts/

execute.command: cd "$GAMEDIR/drive_c/GOG Games/Rayman 2/"; sed -i "s/16/32/g" ubi.ini; cd "$CACHE"; wget "https://github.com/legluondunet/MyLittleLutrisScripts/raw/master/Rayman%202/ws/Rayman2_$INPUT_RATIO.zip";
cd "$GAMEDIR/drive_c/GOG Games/Rayman 2/"; rm -f -r __support 3DfxSpl* glide* goggame* GXSetup.exe nglide_* nGlideEULA.txt webcache.zip Offset* ;

content:
custom-name: Rayman 2 - GOG
files:
- ngl:
    filename: nGlide210_setup.exe
    url: http://www.zeus-software.com/downloads/nglide/d-1.html
- inno: http://constexpr.org/innoextract/files/snapshots/innoextract-1.8-dev-2019-01-13/innoextract-1.8-dev-2019-01-13-linux.tar.xz
- gog: N/A:Select the GOG setup exe
game:
  arch: win64
  exe: drive_c/GOG Games/Rayman 2/Rayman2.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    arch: win64
    install_gecko: false
    install_mono: false
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- extract:
    dst: $CACHE
    file: inno
- execute:
    args: -d "$CACHE" "$gog"
    file: $CACHE/innoextract
- move:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/GOG Games/Rayman 2
    src: $CACHE/app
- merge:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/GOG Games/Rayman 2/
    src: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/GOG Games/Rayman 2/__support/app
- input_menu:
    description: 'Please choose your screen ratio:'
    id: RATIO
    options:
    - 16x9: 16/9
    - 16x10: 16/10
    preselect: 16x9
- execute:
    command: cd "$GAMEDIR/drive_c/GOG Games/Rayman 2/"; sed -i "s/16/32/g" ubi.ini;
      cd "$CACHE"; wget "https://github.com/legluondunet/MyLittleLutrisScripts/raw/master/Rayman%202/ws/Rayman2_$INPUT_RATIO.zip";
- extract:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/GOG Games/Rayman 2/
    src: $CACHE/Rayman2_$INPUT_RATIO.zip
- task:
    args: /S
    description: NGlide installation
    executable: $ngl
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    arch: win64
    key: Resolution
    name: set_regedit
    path: HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Software\Zeus Software\nGlide2
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
    type: REG_SZ
    value: '1'
- task:
    arch: win64
    key: Vsync
    name: set_regedit
    path: HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Software\Zeus Software\nGlide2
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
    type: REG_SZ
    value: '1'
- task:
    arch: win64
    key: csmt
    name: set_regedit
    path: HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Software\Wine\Direct3D\
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
    type: REG_DWORD
    value: '00000000'
- task:
    arch: win64
    key: EAXEnabled
    name: set_regedit
    path: HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Software\Wine\DirectSound\
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
    type: REG_SZ
    value: Y
- task:
    arch: win64
    key: background
    name: set_regedit
    path: HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Control Panel\Colors\
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
    type: REG_SZ
    value: 0 0 0
- execute:
    command: cd "$GAMEDIR/drive_c/GOG Games/Rayman 2/"; rm -f -r __support 3DfxSpl*
      glide* goggame* GXSetup.exe nglide_* nGlideEULA.txt webcache.zip Offset* ;
wine:
  Desktop: true
